title: Understanding Cultural Imposition
text: Cultural imposition occurs when one group enforces its cultural norms and values onto another group, often disregarding the latter's cultural identity.

hintAnswer: imposition of one’s own values, beliefs, and practices upon another person or group
title: Identifying Cultural Imposition
text: Which of the following best describes cultural imposition?
choices: a person’s understanding of their own culture and its impact on themselves
when everyone has a fair opportunity to obtain optimal health
imposition of one’s own values, beliefs, and practices upon another person or group
the client is offered a choice to withdraw from a stressful situation and go to another location
